OOC: Ahhh and I had this beautiful dream to have Talos
die in battle, and then Sunhawk would ralley them
against the Preds at his funeral, and they would go in
to kill her and Drillbit.  Naturally Hotrod couldn't
stop them, but even though Drillbit would die Arcee
would barely be breathing and she would escape with
Hotrod yatta yatta yatta and they would live happily
ever after, except for being hunted by Maximal and
Predicon alike for the rest of the rpg, the end, but I
guess that can't happen now.

--- Jonathan <jhogan@...> wrote:
> Hot Rod quickly left, running out of the base, and
> transforming to car mode. He headed for the battle
> at maximum speed.
> 
> {Talos & Grimlock}
> 
>     The mammoth and robotic t-rex hadn't gotten too
> far yet, both their alternate forms built to be
> rather hardy and strong, not overly quick. It wasn't
> any big suprise to see the dust cloud that heralded
> Hot Rod's movements gaining on them. Focusing on the
> sight ahead Talos hoped Sunhawk had at least taken a
> few bots to keep Megatron busy.
> 
> {Nightshade}
> 
>     The fem bot sat back on her bunk estimating Hot
> Rod's old quickness and the layout of the maximal
> ship. Once she was sure he had enough time to exit
> the ship she extended her arm, flipping up a part of
> her wrist exposing a small series of tools. Moving
> to the door she began working the seal to free
> herself from her quarters. Sorry Hot Rod, she
> thought, I had your ideals once and could trust in
> others good side...but that was a long time ago.
> 
>     Shaking her head Nightshade  grimaced picking
> the magnetic seal on the door quietly...
> 
>
